name: Backrooms: The Phobolore
description:
Backrooms: The Phobolore is a cooperative multiplayer online horror game for 1-4 players.

Introduction

In this game you will take control of a character who woke up in an unknown place and does not remember anything, your task will be to pass the game levels trying to remember who you are, what you are doing here, and what kind of place it is.

    Features

  • Fresh Perspective
    This isn't your typical backrooms experience. It's a unique interpretation that sets it apart from the ordinary.
  • Immersive AI (Sight and Hearing)
    AI's behavior is utterly unpredictable. Even I can't anticipate its next move.
  • Online Co-Op
    Support for up to 4 players at the same time.
  • Multiplayer
    There is something special that will allow you to disturb other players!
  • Intricate level design
    You'll go crazy, but you won't be able to learn the map!
  • Game plot & levels.
    You need to go through all the game levels to find out the whole story, most of the levels are similar to each other, but this is only at first glance!
  • Creepy atmosphere
    Immerse yourself in a creepy world.
  • Replayability
    Items are generated in different places, AI always goes in different ways
  • One life
    And no indulgences!
  • Stealth
    All your actions generate noise and attract attention.
  • Item Pickup
    Easily collect items, even when aiming near them. Priority is given to items you are directly targeting.
    Along with highlighting the items you can pick up

    Also for your attention:
  • Old-school mazes made of corridors
  • The presence of flickering light, be careful if you have problems with it.

Caution

This game is unique compared to many others that focus on the backrooms concept. It sets itself apart by not simply copying everything detailed within the community. Instead, it carefully integrates specific elements of the backrooms, providing a distinct perspective rather than mirroring the entire concept.
